name: Of Mice and Harpies: A Vampire Coterie Tale
name_original: Of Mice and Harpies: A Vampire Coterie Tale
description:
Made for Vampire the Masquerade game jam 2021, Of Mice and Harpies is a story about a vampire coterie trying to receive the right of residence in a new city.

The game is a text-based puzzle. The player's goal is to guess right which of the characters to which locations/missions to send based on their descriptions. 

The quest system is made in accordance with the VtM 5e system, with characters assisting each other, critical successes, and success margins.

To increase replayability, the missions and locations are generated for each play session.

The current build still has a few bugs. Some of them are known to us, but we'd be grateful for any bug reports should our players send us any.
